snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain was ahead of Barack Obama in endorsing gay marriage. But he appears to have put off plans to make it legal in the face of opposition from his right wing.
abstract: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain was ahead of Barack Obama in endorsing gay marriage. But he appears to have put off plans to make it legal in the face of opposition from his right wing.

headline.main: Disappointment as Gay Marriage Is Left Out of Queen's Speech
